Name: Pegasus Door
About the game: Pegasus Door is a mix between FPS and Tower Defense game, but in VR. This game is the prequel of a location based VR Experience currently in development, in Paris, France. Eliminate the successive waves of robots that come to get you, buy new weapons and upgrade them for more efficiency.
Meta Title: Pegasus Door: Sep 7, 2017, Jérémy Pionnier and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Pegasus Door? Check out the release date (Sep 7, 2017), developer insights from Jérémy Pionnier, and a complete game summary.
